entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Alexandria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:23 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moose Creek Wells 6:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -10.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -11.6°C
Wind: SSW 25 km/h gust 37 km/h

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow early this evening. Local blowing snow this evening and overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
